output_list.reason: The mintToken function has an integer overflow that allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The burn function has an integer overflow where the amount of wei given by the user is used to burn tokens from the contract.
The transfer function has an integer overflow where the amount of token given by the user is used to transfer tokens to another user.
The transferFrom function has an integer overflow where the amount of token given by the user is used to transfer tokens from one user to another.
